column1: Custom (select this when using template tag or XML)

column1: Due to limitations of Magento it's only possible to add a slider group to the top or the bottom of a selected product page. Placing a slider on a specific location on a product page will require template customization or the use of the template tag inside the product long description field.
column2: Due to limitations of Magento it's only possible to add a slider group to the top or the bottom of a selected product page. Placing a slider on a specific location on a product page will require template customization or the use of the template tag inside the product long description field.

column1: maximum number of carousel items that should be visible, items will resize fluidly when above this limit.
column2: maximum number of carousel items that should be visible, items will resize fluidly when above this limit.

column1: maximum width of the slider in pixels, leave empty or 0 for full responsive width

column1: minimum number of carousel items that should be visible, items will resize fluidly when below this.
column2: minimum number of carousel items that should be visible, items will resize fluidly when below this.

column1: number of carousel items that should move on animation, if 0 then the slider will move all visible items.
column2: number of carousel items that should move on animation, if 0 then the slider will move all visible items.

column2: pause the slider and start the video automatically
